name: Ultimate Ninja:Shippuden
description:
Bring you back to the Ninja world, in which the Shinobi World War is going to break out. Join the Shinobi Group, fight with your partners, and find out your way of the ninja!

1. According to Bond combination, create the strongest lineup of your own. Upgrade your character to reach higher levels, and make an ascension to attain new abilities.

2. Enjoy the fierce battles in Arena, and show yourself in the Shinobi World War.

3. Full-screen battles with magnificent Ninjutsu, which can make you immerse in the classic ninja combat.

4. Auto-play is available, just easily set it up and obtain plenty of resources in your idle time!

[Tips]
